Class SpectralClass

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.spectroscopy.SpectralClass
public class SpectralClass extends Object
Stellar spectral classification. Morgan-Keenan (MK) system. Data loaded from spectral_classes.json.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
